text:
="preserve">C. M. Chang (born Chongshen Mongkosungkum Chang; 1 April 1942 – 12 October 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Nationalist Democratic Progressive Party. He was born in Tuensang, Nagaland. He was a member of the Lok Sabha between 2009 to 2014. He also was a member of the Nagaland Legislative Assembly between 2013 until his death.
Chang died on 12 October 2020 at a hospital in Kohima, Nagaland from COVID-19 at the age of 78.
